english_example_sentence: You always hit this old nail into the wall carefully.
russian_example_sentence: Вы всегда осторожно забиваете этот старый гвоздь в стену.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, bu eski çiviyi duvara her zaman dikkatli vurursunuz.
